title: Which is better, Hayabusa or Yamaha R1? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yamaha R1 is a more “practical” motorcycle.. The bike is used in super-bike championships, that’s how this bike is good. To be specific, the Hayabusa is heavier by 66 kg, has a longer wheelbase by 75mm and has lesser ground clearance. To be very honest the bike doesn’t look good too! That might be my perspective though. What isn’t a perspective, is that it handles bad and is meant for straights and top speed. The Suzuki bike that can rival the R1 is the GSX-R1000. They share proper racing dynamics and go head to head in timed event. Hope that helps.
